blog.name: shitty-aus
blog.title: Shitty AUs as I Think of Them

tags: i just think itd be a nice little detail
summary:
I’ve been thinking about detective pikachu and thought of something little I’d want to see in the movie.
Say, Ted has to capture...
body:
I’ve been thinking about detective pikachu and thought of something little I’d want to see in the movie.

Say, Ted has to capture a Pokémon in the movie. When it snaps shut and shakes three times, the ball plays a sort of quick music box version of the capture jingle.

Not an important detail, but I think it’d be neat to see.

blog.name: mandalawritersmart
blog.title: Reimagine!
blog.description: Promoting Positivity through your favorite characters!

title: Human-mon! Gotta Catch ‘Em All!
body:
META KNIGHT: So, here are the basic ground rules: number one, don’t touch mi bebe (my baby). Number two, don’t touch mi bebe! And number three-

INCINEROAR: Don’t touch your kid?

META KNIGHT: I was gonna say, “Always fight fair”, but yeah, that too!

INCINEROAR: I don’t even think that’s possible. I’m friendly with children! 

META KNIGHT: (sarcastically) Right. Like you were “friendly” with Lucas.

INCINEROAR: I’m serious!

KIRBY: Poyo!

JK! That’s just something silly I wanted to write down! LOL, Incineroar kinda gives me that vibe of an egotist; it’s why he’s one of my least favorite of the Smash characters. Besides, if he did hurt Lucas, it’s probably because he didn’t know there were going to be kids in Smash. Big shocker! Seriously, though, not cool, Incineroar.

Anyway, here’s the real story:

(Scene starts in the Smash conference room. All of the pokemon smashers plus the assist trophies are sitting in front of a presentation. KIRBY, JIGGLYPUFF, and ADELINE from Star Allies are standing in front.)

LUCARIO: (front seat) Why are we even here?

IVYSAUR: (laying on the ground) Patience, Lucario, I believe these kids have something to show us.

MEWTWO: (standing behind) It better be important.

ADELINE: Greetings, pokemon! (Twirls her paintbrush a bit) Boy, do we have a showcase for you!

MEWTWO: (to LUCARIO) I bet it’s an art show.

KIRBY:So, as you know, Detective Pikachu is coming out in theaters soon!

PIKACHU: (curling up on a chair in the fifth row) Pika! Pika!

PICHU: (sadden, standing on the edge of the stage) Why ‘ot ‘tective Pichu?

KIRBY: No worries, Pichu, you’ll be a star soon!

PICHU: (brighten up) Pichu!

MEWTWO: We get it! So, what’s the point?

KIRBY: Jigglypuff and I were so inspired by the trailer that we decided to make a movie ourselves!

IVYSAUR: I’m listening.

JIGGLYPUFF: Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: That’s right, my friend! It’ll be the show of spectacular!

MEWTWO: So, what’s it about?

KIRBY: Imagine this: there is a mysterious stone that no pokemon trainer knows about…

GRENINJA: (sitting next to MEWTWO) Sounds interesting so far.

KIRBY: (making body expressions) One pokemon finds herself in the cave of the mysterious stone. The moment she touches the stone, a great shock comes to her! She passes out! (JIGGLYPUFF pretends to pass out) When she wakes up and looks in the mirror-

GRENINJA: (hysterical) She’s a pokemon zombie! Oh, I knew it! I knew it would happen, but nobody listened to me!

MEWTWO: She didn’t even say what happened!

GRENINJA: (blushing) Oh, right. Carry on.

KIRBY: (straight face) Right. (Clears throat) As I was saying, when she looked in the mirror, she found out she was…wait for it…a human!

(ALL POKEMON except JIGGLYPUFF gasped. GRENINJA screams and “passes” out.)

MEWTWO: (rolling eyes) Seriously, Greninja.

GRENINJA: (getting up) It’s more scary than turning into a zombie!

(MEWTWO groans)

IVYSAUR: A human? How is that possible?

KIRBY: (ghostly voice) Nobody knows!

LUCARIO: (not amused) Point being?

KIRBY: That pokemon will embark on a journey to discover what it means to be pokemon trainer, a human! To rise above the ranks!

IVYSAUR: You’re talking about evolving, right?

KIRBY: No! I’m talking about something bigger! (Shows pictures) As you can see, Adeline had drawn out the plot! Jigglypuff will be the star of the movie!

ADELINE: Unfortunately, there’s a lot of holes in the plot. We haven’t thought out much yet.

LUCARIO: (indifferent) Well, too bad. You can’t have a movie without plot.

IVYSAUR: Now, Lucario, just because the plot hasn’t been developed doesn’t mean it never will. (LUCARIO grabs a bowl of water and starts drinking it.)

PICHU: (in agreement) Pichu!

GRENINJA: (with passion) You know what? I think this is a great idea! However, I believe it needs more characters.

ADELINE: (sassy) You think?

GRENINJA: I’d say that the female pokemon needs friends to touch the stone and journey with her! [especially since it’s so scary!]

MEWTWO: (starting to get into it) Speaking of scary, why not add a horror element to this story.

GRENINJA: Yeah, yeah! What if there’s a pokemon that is determined to find the stone himself?

MEWTWO: (enjoying himself) A bad one. A tortured pokemon who believed that being “enslaved” by humans is unfair!

GRENINJA: Enslaved? Isn’t that stretching a bit far?

MEWTWO: That’s just how he feels.

KIRBY! (Whispering to ADELINE) Are you writing this down?

ADELINE: Better! I’m drawing it! (Paints on canvas)

MEOWTH: (back corner) Oo! Oo! I could be the bad guy! I am born for this role, naturally. Wobuffet can be my partner in crime!

WOBUFFET: (in front of MEOWTH) Wobuffet!

KIRBY: If that’s the case, why not just add Team Rocket to this story?

MEWTWO: What could Team Rocker do?

IVYSAUR: They can try to capture the human pokemon.

KIRBY: (excited) Exactly! Team Rocket could become paranoid and start capturing humans!

IVYSAUR: Right after they see a pokemon transforming.

MEWTWO: Hey, I just got an idea; what if Meowth used their paranoia against them?

MEOWTH:(rubbing his head) What do you mean?

GRENINJA: I think he means that Meowth uses them to get to the stone, and once he gets it, he betrays Team Rocket!

WOBUFFET: Wobuffet!

GRENINJA: Oh, and that guy as well.

KIRBY: (shocked) Meowth betrays Team Rocket?

MEOWTH! Talk about a plot twist! (ADELINE paints furiously)

KIRBY: Or better yet! Meowth plans to use the stone to build an army and conquer the humans!

LUCARIO: (spits out water) What? That’s unnatural!

KIRBY: (evil grin) Exactly!

JIGGLYPUFF:Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: Oh, you’re right, Jigglypuff, we should add some romance to our story!

MEWTWO: Romance?

KIRBY: I got it! The pokemon turned human will fall in love with his trainer!

LUCARIO: (shocked) What! That’s also unnatural!

GRENINJA: (ignoring LUCARIO) Such a sweet yet tragic love…

KIRBY: Ever since he got to know his trainer in a different way, he loves her so dearly! Ever since, he’ll do anything to protect her!

IVYSAUR: His trainer falls for him as well, but she doesn’t know that’s actually her pokemon.

GRENINJA: (dramatic) Oh, the irony!

LUCARIO: (annoyed) Guys…

KIRBY: Oh, that poor galan! (spanish for handsome man, usually to indicate the male lover in a romantic movie.) Longing for his love but can’t reach!

(JIGGLYPUFF sniffles)

MEOWTH: But who can be that guy?

GRENINJA: I volunteer Lucario!

LUCARIO: (getting tensed up) Are you kidding me?

KIRBY: (eyes wide open) Lucario as the romantic guy? (She and JIGGLYPUFF squeals as fangirls.)

LUCARIO: Uh…(blushing)

GARDEVOIR: (middle left) Well, I wouldn’t go far on that…

GRENINJA: Lucario tries to protect the love of his life, which is ironically his trainer! Wait,who was she again?

KIRBY: I believe her name is Korrina.

LUCARIO: (panicking) Wait, wait! Please don’t involve my trainer!

KIRBY: (ignoring him) That sweet hunk will have to decide if he should tell the truth to Korrina or not.

IVYSAUR: She’ll have to find out, eventually.

PICHU:(approving) Pichu!

MEWTWO: I’m not interested int that mushy stuff. If there’s going to be a movie, it’ll need some action!

MEOWTH: I got it! Team Rocket goes after Korrina!

GRENINJA: And Lucario has to save her!

KIRBY: Oo, could that happen while they’re on a date?

ADELINE: Better yet, a ball!

MEOWTH: A ball?

GARDEVOIR: I think a trainer’s meeting would be best.

LUCARIO: (shocked) Seriously?

JIGGLYPUFF: Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: (extremely excited) Wait, Jigglypuff just got an idea! (Making body expressions) Lucario, as his human self, dives in to save Korrina before Team Rocket could catch her! In the end, she is grateful, and they both kiss!

LUCARIO: (angered) Okay, now you’ve gone too far!

MEWTWO: Calm down, Lucario, we’re just making suggestions.

MEOWTH: This is great and all, but what about Pikachu?

IVYSAUR: Can’t have a pokemon movie without Pikachu.

SQUIRTLE: (laying next to IVYSAUR) Squirtle!

KIRBY: (becomes thoughtful for a second) I got it! During the last battle, when all hope seems to be lost, Pikachu makes a fabulous entrance! (PICHU whimpers in sadness; KIRBY feels compassionate towards him) But, of course, he wouldn’t be complete without Pichu by his side. (PICHU makes a big smile) Together, they both save the day!

(Everyone but LUCARIO gets hyped up)

MEOWTH: What about the final battle?

MEWTWO: It’s be human Meowth versus humans Jigglypuff and Lucario in a fight, trying to save the humans from his wrath!

KIRBY: And that’s when Pikachu and Pichu comes in to save the day!

PIKACHU: Pika!

PICHU: Yay!

LUCARIO: Wait, I didn’t agree to any of this-

KIRBY: Then it’s settled! Let’s go make ourselves a pokemon movie!

(Everyone but LUCARIO cheers. GARDEVOIR approaches him)

LUCARIO: (upset) I guess I somehow need to be a part of this.

GARDEVOIR: (giggling) No worries, Lucario, it’ll be a fun thing to do besides just waiting for Detective Pikachu to come out.

LUCARIO: (turns and blushes at the sight of GARDEVIOR’s beauty) Yeah, I guess so.

KIRBY: (with a cellphone) Man, I have to make so many phone calls. (Everyone else talks in the background. KIRBY calls Ash) Hello? Yes, it’s me, Kirby…

(End)

INCINEROAR: (scratching his head) Wait, so they’re making the Detective Pikachu movie?

META KNIGHT: (chuckling) No, Incineroar, Kirby and the rest of the pokemon are going to make their own movie while they wait for the real movie to come out.

INCINEROAR: (hyped up) Awesome! Say, do you think they’ll let me in their movie? (Shows off muscles) I make a pretty good stuntman!

META KNIGHT:😑

Enjoy!

PICHU: (sadden, standing on the edge of the stage) Why ‘ot ‘tective Pichu?

KIRBY: No worries, Pichu, you’ll be a star soon!

PICHU: (brighten up) Pichu!

MEWTWO: We get it! So, what’s the point?

KIRBY: Jigglypuff and I were so inspired by the trailer that we decided to make a movie ourselves!

IVYSAUR: I’m listening.

JIGGLYPUFF: Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: That’s right, my friend! It’ll be the show of spectacular!

MEWTWO: So, what’s it about?

KIRBY: Imagine this: there is a mysterious stone that no pokemon trainer knows about…

GRENINJA: (sitting next to MEWTWO) Sounds interesting so far.

KIRBY: (making body expressions) One pokemon finds herself in the cave of the mysterious stone. The moment she touches the stone, a great shock comes to her! She passes out! (JIGGLYPUFF pretends to pass out) When she wakes up and looks in the mirror-

GRENINJA: (hysterical) She’s a pokemon zombie! Oh, I knew it! I knew it would happen, but nobody listened to me!

MEWTWO: She didn’t even say what happened!

GRENINJA: (blushing) Oh, right. Carry on.

KIRBY: (straight face) Right. (Clears throat) As I was saying, when she looked in the mirror, she found out she was…wait for it…a human!

(ALL POKEMON except JIGGLYPUFF gasped. GRENINJA screams and “passes” out.)

MEWTWO: (rolling eyes) Seriously, Greninja.

GRENINJA: (getting up) It’s more scary than turning into a zombie!

(MEWTWO groans)

IVYSAUR: A human? How is that possible?

KIRBY: (ghostly voice) Nobody knows!

LUCARIO: (not amused) Point being?

KIRBY: That pokemon will embark on a journey to discover what it means to be pokemon trainer, a human! To rise above the ranks!

IVYSAUR: You’re talking about evolving, right?

KIRBY: No! I’m talking about something bigger! (Shows pictures) As you can see, Adeline had drawn out the plot! Jigglypuff will be the star of the movie!

ADELINE: Unfortunately, there’s a lot of holes in the plot. We haven’t thought out much yet.

LUCARIO: (indifferent) Well, too bad. You can’t have a movie without plot.

IVYSAUR: Now, Lucario, just because the plot hasn’t been developed doesn’t mean it never will. (LUCARIO grabs a bowl of water and starts drinking it.)

PICHU: (in agreement) Pichu!

GRENINJA: (with passion) You know what? I think this is a great idea! However, I believe it needs more characters.

ADELINE: (sassy) You think?

GRENINJA: I’d say that the female pokemon needs friends to touch the stone and journey with her! [especially since it’s so scary!]

MEWTWO: (starting to get into it) Speaking of scary, why not add a horror element to this story.

GRENINJA: Yeah, yeah! What if there’s a pokemon that is determined to find the stone himself?

MEWTWO: (enjoying himself) A bad one. A tortured pokemon who believed that being “enslaved” by humans is unfair!

GRENINJA: Enslaved? Isn’t that stretching a bit far?

MEWTWO: That’s just how he feels.

KIRBY! (Whispering to ADELINE) Are you writing this down?

ADELINE: Better! I’m drawing it! (Paints on canvas)

MEOWTH: (back corner) Oo! Oo! I could be the bad guy! I am born for this role, naturally. Wobuffet can be my partner in crime!

WOBUFFET: (in front of MEOWTH) Wobuffet!

KIRBY: If that’s the case, why not just add Team Rocket to this story?

MEWTWO: What could Team Rocker do?

IVYSAUR: They can try to capture the human pokemon.

KIRBY: (excited) Exactly! Team Rocket could become paranoid and start capturing humans!

IVYSAUR: Right after they see a pokemon transforming.

MEWTWO: Hey, I just got an idea; what if Meowth used their paranoia against them?

MEOWTH:(rubbing his head) What do you mean?

GRENINJA: I think he means that Meowth uses them to get to the stone, and once he gets it, he betrays Team Rocket!

WOBUFFET: Wobuffet!

GRENINJA: Oh, and that guy as well.

KIRBY: (shocked) Meowth betrays Team Rocket?

MEOWTH! Talk about a plot twist! (ADELINE paints furiously)

KIRBY: Or better yet! Meowth plans to use the stone to build an army and conquer the humans!

LUCARIO: (spits out water) What? That’s unnatural!

KIRBY: (evil grin) Exactly!

JIGGLYPUFF:Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: Oh, you’re right, Jigglypuff, we should add some romance to our story!

MEWTWO: Romance?

KIRBY: I got it! The pokemon turned human will fall in love with his trainer!

LUCARIO: (shocked) What! That’s also unnatural!

GRENINJA: (ignoring LUCARIO) Such a sweet yet tragic love…

KIRBY: Ever since he got to know his trainer in a different way, he loves her so dearly! Ever since, he’ll do anything to protect her!

IVYSAUR: His trainer falls for him as well, but she doesn’t know that’s actually her pokemon.

GRENINJA: (dramatic) Oh, the irony!

LUCARIO: (annoyed) Guys…

KIRBY: Oh, that poor galan! (spanish for handsome man, usually to indicate the male lover in a romantic movie.) Longing for his love but can’t reach!

(JIGGLYPUFF sniffles)

MEOWTH: But who can be that guy?

GRENINJA: I volunteer Lucario!

LUCARIO: (getting tensed up) Are you kidding me?

KIRBY: (eyes wide open) Lucario as the romantic guy? (She and JIGGLYPUFF squeals as fangirls.)

LUCARIO: Uh…(blushing)

GARDEVOIR: (middle left) Well, I wouldn’t go far on that…

GRENINJA: Lucario tries to protect the love of his life, which is ironically his trainer! Wait,who was she again?

KIRBY: I believe her name is Korrina.

LUCARIO: (panicking) Wait, wait! Please don’t involve my trainer!

KIRBY: (ignoring him) That sweet hunk will have to decide if he should tell the truth to Korrina or not.

IVYSAUR: She’ll have to find out, eventually.

PICHU:(approving) Pichu!

MEWTWO: I’m not interested int that mushy stuff. If there’s going to be a movie, it’ll need some action!

MEOWTH: I got it! Team Rocket goes after Korrina!

GRENINJA: And Lucario has to save her!

KIRBY: Oo, could that happen while they’re on a date?

ADELINE: Better yet, a ball!

MEOWTH: A ball?

GARDEVOIR: I think a trainer’s meeting would be best.

LUCARIO: (shocked) Seriously?

JIGGLYPUFF: Jigglypuff!

KIRBY: (extremely excited) Wait, Jigglypuff just got an idea! (Making body expressions) Lucario, as his human self, dives in to save Korrina before Team Rocket could catch her! In the end, she is grateful, and they both kiss!

LUCARIO: (angered) Okay, now you’ve gone too far!

MEWTWO: Calm down, Lucario, we’re just making suggestions.

MEOWTH: This is great and all, but what about Pikachu?

IVYSAUR: Can’t have a pokemon movie without Pikachu.

SQUIRTLE: (laying next to IVYSAUR) Squirtle!

KIRBY: (becomes thoughtful for a second) I got it! During the last battle, when all hope seems to be lost, Pikachu makes a fabulous entrance! (PICHU whimpers in sadness; KIRBY feels compassionate towards him) But, of course, he wouldn’t be complete without Pichu by his side. (PICHU makes a big smile) Together, they both save the day!

(Everyone but LUCARIO gets hyped up)

MEOWTH: What about the final battle?

MEWTWO: It’s be human Meowth versus humans Jigglypuff and Lucario in a fight, trying to save the humans from his wrath!

KIRBY: And that’s when Pikachu and Pichu comes in to save the day!

PIKACHU: Pika!

PICHU: Yay!

LUCARIO: Wait, I didn’t agree to any of this-

KIRBY: Then it’s settled! Let’s go make ourselves a pokemon movie!

(Everyone but LUCARIO cheers. GARDEVOIR approaches him)

LUCARIO: (upset) I guess I somehow need to be a part of this.

GARDEVOIR: (giggling) No worries, Lucario, it’ll be a fun thing to do besides just waiting for Detective Pikachu to come out.

LUCARIO: (turns and blushes at the sight of GARDEVIOR’s beauty) Yeah, I guess so.

KIRBY: (with a cellphone) Man, I have to make so many phone calls. (Everyone else talks in the background. KIRBY calls Ash) Hello? Yes, it’s me, Kirby…

(End)

INCINEROAR: (scratching his head) Wait, so they’re making the Detective Pikachu movie?

META KNIGHT: (chuckling) No, Incineroar, Kirby and the rest of the pokemon are going to make their own movie while they wait for the real movie to come out.

INCINEROAR: (hyped up) Awesome! Say, do you think they’ll let me in their movie? (Shows off muscles) I make a pretty good stuntman!

META KNIGHT:😑

Enjoy!
trail.content:
META KNIGHT: So, here are the basic ground rules: number one, don’t touch mi bebe (my baby). Number two, don’t touch mi bebe! And number three-

INCINEROAR: Don’t touch your kid?

META KNIGHT: I was gonna say, “Always fight fair”, but yeah, that too!

INCINEROAR: I don’t even think that’s possible. I’m friendly with children! 

META KNIGHT: (sarcastically) Right. Like you were “friendly” with Lucas.

INCINEROAR: I’m serious!

KIRBY: Poyo!

JK! That’s just something silly I wanted to write down! LOL, Incineroar kinda gives me that vibe of an egotist; it’s why he’s one of my least favorite of the Smash characters. Besides, if he did hurt Lucas, it’s probably because he didn’t know there were going to be kids in Smash. Big shocker! Seriously, though, not cool, Incineroar.

Anyway, here’s the real story:

(Scene starts in the Smash conference room. All of the pokemon smashers plus the assist trophies are sitting in front of a presentation. KIRBY, JIGGLYPUFF, and ADELINE from Star Allies are standing in front.)

LUCARIO: (front seat) Why are we even here?

IVYSAUR: (laying on the ground) Patience, Lucario, I believe these kids have something to show us.

MEWTWO: (standing behind) It better be important.

ADELINE: Greetings, pokemon! (Twirls her paintbrush a bit) Boy, do we have a showcase for you!

MEWTWO: (to LUCARIO) I bet it’s an art show.

KIRBY:So, as you know, Detective Pikachu is coming out in theaters soon!

PIKACHU: (curling up on a chair in the fifth row) Pika! Pika!

PICHU: (sadden, standing on the edge of the stage) Why ‘ot ‘tective Pichu?

KIRBY: No worries, Pichu, you’ll be a star soon!

PICHU: (brighten up) Pichu!

MEWTWO: We get it! So, what’s the point?

KIRBY: Jigglypuff and I were so inspired by the trailer that we decided to make a movie ourselves!

GRENINJA: (hysterical) She’s a pokemon zombie! Oh, I knew it! I knew it would happen, but nobody listened to me!

GRENINJA: (blushing) Oh, right. Carry on.

KIRBY: (straight face) Right. (Clears throat) As I was saying, when she looked in the mirror, she found out she was…wait for it…a human!

(ALL POKEMON except JIGGLYPUFF gasped. GRENINJA screams and “passes” out.)

MEWTWO: (rolling eyes) Seriously, Greninja.

GRENINJA: (getting up) It’s more scary than turning into a zombie!

(MEWTWO groans)

IVYSAUR: A human? How is that possible?

KIRBY: (ghostly voice) Nobody knows!

LUCARIO: (not amused) Point being?

KIRBY: That pokemon will embark on a journey to discover what it means to be pokemon trainer, a human! To rise above the ranks!

IVYSAUR: You’re talking about evolving, right?

KIRBY: No! I’m talking about something bigger! (Shows pictures) As you can see, Adeline had drawn out the plot! Jigglypuff will be the star of the movie!

ADELINE: Unfortunately, there’s a lot of holes in the plot. We haven’t thought out much yet.

LUCARIO: (indifferent) Well, too bad. You can’t have a movie without plot.

IVYSAUR: Now, Lucario, just because the plot hasn’t been developed doesn’t mean it never will. (LUCARIO grabs a bowl of water and starts drinking it.)

PICHU: (in agreement) Pichu!

GRENINJA: (with passion) You know what? I think this is a great idea! However, I believe it needs more characters.

ADELINE: (sassy) You think?

GRENINJA: I’d say that the female pokemon needs friends to touch the stone and journey with her! [especially since it’s so scary!]

MEWTWO: (starting to get into it) Speaking of scary, why not add a horror element to this story.

GRENINJA: Yeah, yeah! What if there’s a pokemon that is determined to find the stone himself?

MEWTWO: (enjoying himself) A bad one. A tortured pokemon who believed that being “enslaved” by humans is unfair!

GRENINJA: Enslaved? Isn’t that stretching a bit far?

MEWTWO: That’s just how he feels.

KIRBY! (Whispering to ADELINE) Are you writing this down?

ADELINE: Better! I’m drawing it! (Paints on canvas)

MEOWTH: (back corner) Oo! Oo! I could be the bad guy! I am born for this role, naturally. Wobuffet can be my partner in crime!

WOBUFFET: (in front of MEOWTH) Wobuffet!

KIRBY: If that’s the case, why not just add Team Rocket to this story?

MEOWTH: This is great and all, but what about Pikachu?

SQUIRTLE: (laying next to IVYSAUR) Squirtle!

KIRBY: (becomes thoughtful for a second) I got it! During the last battle, when all hope seems to be lost, Pikachu makes a fabulous entrance! (PICHU whimpers in sadness; KIRBY feels compassionate towards him) But, of course, he wouldn’t be complete without Pichu by his side. (PICHU makes a big smile) Together, they both save the day!

summary: Hello dudes. Today i bring you something i was doing during the entire week. More than the execution, the thought proccess of...
caption:
Hello dudes. Today i bring you something i was doing during the entire week. More than the execution, the thought proccess of the piece was so freaking long. Once i had a strong idea it flow so naturally that i almost forgot how it end up like this hehe.
Also this is my entry for the contest of making graphic pieces for the movie, a contest that Warner did.
Take a look https://www.talenthouse.com/i/crear-material-grafico-para-pokemon-detective-pikachu-warner-bros/participate
So wish me luck and enjoy102550100 NestedThreadedFlat

summary: Can people make realistic pokemon without trying to make it a ookey goopy weird vein monster buff neighmare fuel pimple creature...
body:
Can people make realistic pokemon without trying to make it a ookey goopy weird vein monster buff neighmare fuel pimple creature with kawaii animu eyes?

“but thats what it would look like in real life” okay first of all what fucked up drugs you on that you see anything like that in real life

second of all have you ever walked outside

Detective Pikachu (2018)

I was inspired by the Detective Pikachu trailer to do a little “Noir” take. Forget it, Pikachu. It’s Pokétown.

reblog.comment:
Detective Pikachu (2018)

I was inspired by the Detective Pikachu trailer to do a little “Noir” take. Forget it, Pikachu. It’s Pokétown.
